faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Everything you need to know about SCLight Exchange

items.question: What is a cryptocurrency exchange?
items.answer: A cryptocurrency exchange is a digital marketplace where traders can buy, sell, and exchange cryptocurrencies. SCLight Exchange is the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, offering spot trading, futures, staking, and more.

items.question: What products does SCLight Exchange provide?
items.answer: SCLight Exchange offers a comprehensive suite of products including Spot Trading, Futures Trading, Margin Trading, Savings & Staking, NFT Marketplace, SCLight Exchange Pay, SCLight Exchange Card, and educational resources through SCLight Exchange Academy.

items.question: How to buy Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies on SCLight Exchange
items.answer: You can buy crypto on SCLight Exchange using credit/debit cards, bank transfers, P2P trading, or third-party payment channels. Simply create an account, complete verification, deposit funds, and start trading.

items.question: How to track cryptocurrency prices
items.answer: SCLight Exchange provides real-time price tracking through our website and mobile app. You can view live charts, set price alerts, analyze market trends, and access historical data for all listed cryptocurrencies.

items.question: How to trade cryptocurrencies on SCLight Exchange
items.answer: After funding your account, navigate to the trading interface, select your trading pair, choose between market or limit orders, enter your amount, and execute the trade. We offer spot, margin, and futures trading options.

items.question: How to earn from crypto on SCLight Exchange
items.answer: SCLight Exchange offers multiple earning opportunities: Flexible Savings (earn interest on idle assets), Locked Staking (higher APY for locked periods), Launchpool (farm new tokens), and Liquidity Farming.

mobileApp.description: Download the SCLight Exchange app and access your portfolio, trade crypto, and manage your account from anywhere in the world.

faqList.question: What is P2P exchange?
faqList.answer: P2P stands for peer-to-peer, and P2P exchanges are platforms that allow users to buy and sell crypto for fiat currency directly with other users.

faqList.question: How do I buy Bitcoin locally on SC-LITE P2P?
faqList.answer: After you complete identity verification and add your payment methods, you are ready to buy crypto on SC-LITE P2P platform. First, choose from all the available offers in the marketplace. Second, place an order to buy your crypto, and pay the seller based on the preferred payment methods. Lastly, get your crypto from the seller after you complete the fiat transaction and confirm your payment on SC-LITE P2P.

faqList.question: Learn more about What is P2P Trading and How Does a Local Bitcoin Exchange Work?
